sub_title: Powering Green Energy Transition | Green Hydrogen & Green Fuels Project Development | MBA - European School of Management I Ex- Thyssenkrupp AG, KBR Inc, Wood Inc
summary:
A senior Business development leader, Engineer & MBA educated (from global business school) with Multilingual skills  and with multi year rich global experience in P&L management, Sales/ Business Development, Power-2-X, Green/ Sustainable energy Businesses including roles in Corporate Strategy Development, M&A & Project Management in various global locations and developed markets in Europe, US, Middle East, SEA & India. His experience spans various sectors like Renewables, green fuels, Petrochemicals, chemicals & speciality chemicals, Fertilizers, refining, Renewables, cement and Mining industries. 

Part of a highly skilled, Capable and motivated team of dynamic professionals in Stamicarbon and Maire Tecnimont delivering Green and sustainable technologies and projects worldwide. 

Presently leading Green hydrogen / NH3 and green fuels business development & management in global regions for Stamicarbon BV, a group company of Maire Tecnimont.

projects.title: Technology Innovation and Start-up's in new age technology areas in Silicon valley, San Francisco
projects.description:
It was one month intense programme which was part of the curriculum in silicon Valley, Sanfransico. Led by our lead professors, we travelled from Berlin to Silicon Valley to learn about the big transformations in technology industry and how they could be on top of it. 

Over the one month period, we MBA students discussed technology advancements with academicians at Standford School, engaged with change-makers in the Valley such as GOOGLE, BLOOM ENERGY, MOZILLA, TESLA MOTORS  and other that houses the world's largest technology companies, startups and venture capital firms.

projects.title: Singapore parallel Train, Exxonmobil
projects.description:
Singapore Aromatics Recovery (SAR)
Singapore Aromatics Recovery (SAR) uses the UOP Parex technology to produce paraxylene and the UOP sulfolane technology to make benzene. These cutting edge technologies allow efficient production of high-purity products to meet the demands of customers.
Production: 
•240 KTA benzene
•450 KTA paraxylene

projects.title: Indian Oil Corporation Limited, Paradip Refinery Project
projects.description:
15m tonne/year grassroots refinery at Paradip in India’s eastern Orissa state. Worked in the project feed and cost estimate stage as managing consultant and was in charge of designing engineering, procurement and construction contracts for key process units including the crude distillation, reforming, alkylation and butane isomerisation units.

Financial terms or the expected completion date were not disclosed.

IOC is believed to be keen on developing petrochemicals production downstream of the Paradip

projects.title: Qatar Chemicals and petrochemicals
projects.description: Worked as a Project Engineer for Turnkey Construction of Q-Chem complex in Mesaieed Industrial City, comprising of ethylene unit (capable of producing 500,000 metric tons per annum (mtpa)), a polyethylene facility (capable of 453,000 mtpa), and a 1-hexene unit (capable of 47,000 mtpa). It also included a sulfur recovery and solidification unit, a bagging and storage warehouse, a nitrogen unit, a water treatment plant, seawater cooling system, dock facilities and various administrative buildings

profile_positions.location: ( Part of Maire Tecnimont Group) Netherlands / Global Locations
profile_positions.description: Global P&L role Responsible for project Development of carbon free solutions business line in Stamicarbon part of Global Maire Tecnimont group. In this role of Power-2-X technology business we develop and execute business goals and our strategic offering to project developments globally of Green hydrogen & Ammonia and sustainable downstream fertilizer including NA, AN. Through this role I am privileged to collaborate with smart teams globally to drive energy transition by Expanding the availability of low cost green Hydrogen and green fuels to help decarbonize "hard to abate"sectors like shipping, steel, fertilizers, aviation and chemicals.
profile_positions.title: Global Power2X Business Manager - Green Fuel ( H2/ NH3)

profile_positions.description: Member of Global Ammonia energy association
profile_positions.title: Member

profile_positions.description: Worked with the CEO and promoters of the company, heading strategy, growth initiatives & Change Management in a leading stock listed petrochemical company Indo- German Petrochemicals Limited (IGPL) located at Mumbai ( HQ) and various plant locations with a global turnover in excess of $350 Mio . IG Petrochemicals Ltd was established in technical collaboration with Lurgi Gmbh, Germany. The public listed company commands approx 65% of market share in India.
profile_positions.title: Senior General Manager & Head- Strategy & New Business (Promoters Office)

profile_positions.location: Global locations including, Houston, Delhi, SEA
profile_positions.description: P&L role for technology business development and sales reported to Sr.Vice president Global sales (Houston) in business acquisition for technology licensing, Basic design package, proprietary equipment, catalyst supply and consulting for various KBR technologies like Ammonia Syngas, Refining, Olefins, Petrochemicals, Chemicals and Acids. Leading Business teams for Technology license sales including multi disciplinary Teams for technocommercial discussions and acquisitions of business in key KBR technologies.
profile_positions.title: Senior Technology Business Development Manager

profile_positions.location: Global locations including Germany, Middle east, India & SEA
profile_positions.description: Senior P&L role Responsible for Technology business development in various strategic sectors including Electrolysis, Ammonia, nitrates and polyolefins including petrochemicals. market entry strategy for new markets and services. Actively worked with the CEO and sales Director on long term planning on strategic target setting for the process technology  and turnkey contracts group. Worked at various locations including Essen, Düsseldorf, Berlin, Singapore, Middle East locations. Assisted client in their project development phase. Involvement in marketing concepts for Thyssenkrupp's technology portfolio and EPC services. Explored the possibilities of forging alliances / partnerships for joint bidding. Developed various business Plans to enter new business areas and Identify Strategic Initiatives along with Business unit heads.

volunteer_experiences.description: My association with the NGO “Help Age India” set up to protect the rights and provide relief to aged in our country, began largely because of my own interest in helping aling senior citizens, who spend a considerable portion of thier life without thier children in old age homes. Many children of our generation consider parents a burden & abandon them in old-age homes. This inhumanly treatment motivated me to work towards this cause.
Various CSR activities associated with Thyssenkrupp India.
